%#,#literal#),ALIAS(DIVIDE(ROUNDING(SCALE(AVERAGE(DOWNSAMPLE(1739439360000:1739442960000:chronicle.aws.perf1-useast2.core1:oracle_sysmetric{metric_name=Host__CPU__Utilization*,host=gra201-a1*,cell=gra201}:avg:60s-avg,#all-avg#)),#100#)),#100#),#DB CPU Util %#,#literal#),ALIAS(1739439360000:1739442960000:sfms_system.salesforce.aws.perf1-useast2.core1:cpustats.utilization_rate{cell=gra201,service=sdb}:avg:all-avg,#DB CPU Util DB CPU Util %#,#literal#),ALIAS(PERCENTILE(1739439360000:1739442960000:chronicle.aws.perf1-useast2.core1:oracle_sysmetric{metric_name=Host__CPU__Utilization*,host=gra201-a1*,cell=gra201}:avg:1m-avg,#90#, SPLUNK.name: 4xx and 5xx Errors - Client Side Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search `from_index_distapps` falcon_instance::perf1-useast2 starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 functional_domain::core1 service_name::* k8s_cluster::sam-processing1 k8s_namespace::performance k8s_pod_name::ff0df22a-ad52-47e4-8332-419fc5740310* sourcetype="merlin:replayforce:csv"| eval fields=split(_raw,",") | eval statuscode=mvindex(fields,5) | search statuscode=5* OR statuscode=4* | stats count as rows by statuscode | append [search `from_index_distapps` falcon_instance::perf1-useast2 starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 functional_domain::core1 service_name::* k8s_cluster::sam-processing1 k8s_namespace::performance k8s_pod_name::ff0df22a-ad52-47e4-8332-419fc5740310* sourcetype="merlin:jmeter:csv"| eval fields=split(_raw,",") | eval statuscode=mvindex(fields,3) | search statuscode=5* OR statuscode=4* | stats count as rows by statuscode] 
| eval responseCode = case(
(like(statuscode,"4%")), "4XX",
(like(statuscode,"5%")), "5XX",
1==1, statuscode)
| stats sum(rows) as "Count" by responseCode | rename responseCode as "Response Code"

SPLUNK.name: Core Cost Logline Detailed Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(A,J,L,R,U,V,a,aprst,apars)` OR `logRecordType(rrlog,vfrmt,2,H)` | eval cpuTimeMs = round(cpuTime,2) | eval dbTotalTimeMs = round(dbTotalTime / 1000000, 2) | eval runTimeMs = round(runTime,2) | eval mvField=split(timeTracker, ",") | eval bytesAllocated=mvindex(mvField,23) | eval bytesAllocatedMB = bytesAllocated/(1024*1024) | stats count as "Request Count" avg(cpuTime) as "avg_CpuTime" perc50(cpuTimeMs) as "p50 CpuTime (ms)" perc90(cpuTimeMs) as "p90 CpuTime (ms)" avg(runTime) as "avg_RunTime" perc50(runTimeMs) as "p50 RunTime (ms)" perc90(runTimeMs) as "p90 RunTime (ms)" avg(dbTotalTimeMs) as "avg_DBTotalTime" perc50(dbTotalTimeMs) as "p50 DBTotalTime (ms)" p90(dbTotalTimeMs) as "p90 DBTotalTime (ms)" avg(bytesAllocatedMB) as avg_AllocatedMemoryInMB by logRecordType | eval avg_CpuTime = round(avg_CpuTime,2) | eval avg_RunTime = round(avg_RunTime,2) | eval avg_DBTotalTime = round(avg_DBTotalTime,2) | eval avg_AllocatedMemoryInMB = round(avg_AllocatedMemoryInMB,2) | rename logRecordType as "LogRecordType" avg_CpuTime as "Avg CpuTime (ms)" avg_RunTime as "Avg RunTime (ms)" avg_DBTotalTime as "Avg DBTotalTime (ms)" avg_AllocatedMemoryInMB as "Avg Allocated Memory (MB)"

SPLUNK.name: Cumulative Aura  Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(augen)` 
| eval actionMessages=split(actionMessage,";") | mvexpand actionMessages | rex field=actionMessages "[0-9]+\$(?<action>[^=]+)=(?<time_ms>\d+)" 
| rex mode=sed field=action "s!(serviceComponent://ui.activities.impl.controllers.ActivityTimelineFixedLayoutController/ACTION\$provide)\{.*\}!&1!" | eval shortAction = substr(action, 0, 107)
| stats count as compared_count, sum(time_ms) as compared_totalTime, avg(time_ms) as compared_avg, perc90(time_ms) as compared_p90

SPLUNK.name: Falcon APT Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 
organizationId=* `logRecordType(A,a,U,apars,aprst,R,apblk)` | dedup timestamp logRecordType requestId 
| eval runTimeMs = round(runTime,2)
| stats dc(host) as "App Host Count" avg(runTimeMs) as "AvgAPT" perc50(runTimeMs) as "p50RunTime" perc90(runTimeMs) as "p90RunTime"
| eval AvgAPT=round(AvgAPT,2),p50RunTime=round(p50RunTime,2),p90RunTime=round(p90RunTime,2)
| rename AvgAPT as "Avg APT (ms)" p50RunTime as "p50 APT (ms)" p90RunTime as "p90 APT (ms)"

SPLUNK.name: Falcon APT Metrics by AZ
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(A,a,U,apars,aprst,R,apblk)` | dedup timestamp logRecordType requestId 
|  eval eventTime=runTime-if(isnotnull(apexCalloutTime),apexCalloutTime,0) | where isnotnull(threadId) | where ((apexCalloutTime >= 0 OR isnull(apexCalloutTime)) AND eventTime >=0 AND eventTime < 18000000) | rex field=pageName "(?<excludeJVDupe>^.*/apex/.*$)" | rex field=logName "(?<excludeSFDCStats>^/(sfdc|stats)/.*$)" | rex field=logName "(?<excludeStaticNoOrg>^.*(Api|Soap|Image|dynamicCSS|ping.jsp).*$)" | eval filterSFDCStats = if(isnotnull(excludeSFDCStats),1,0) | eval filterJVDupe = if(isnotnull(excludeJVDupe) AND logRecordType="J",1,0) | eval filterChatter = if(requestMethod="HEAD" AND logName="/" AND logRecordType="U",1,0) | eval filterBadAPRST = if(statusCode=401 AND logRecordType="aprst",1,0) | eval filterStaticNoOrg = if(isnotnull(excludeStaticNoOrg) AND (isnull(organizationId) OR organizationId="" OR substr(organizationId,1,3)!="00D"),1,0) | eval filterNoUser = if((isnull(userId) OR userId="") AND (isnotnull(organizationId) AND organizationId!=""),1,0) | where filterSFDCStats=0 AND filterJVDupe=0 AND filterChatter=0 AND filterBadAPRST=0 AND filterStaticNoOrg=0 AND filterNoUser=0| eval dbTotalTime_ms=round(dbTotalTime/1000000)|  eval dbTotalTimeMs = dbTotalTime/1000000 | eval memcachedMS = memcached/1000000 |  stats  dc(host) as ServerCount
count as RequestCount  avg(runTime) as avgRunTimeMs avg(dbTotalTimeMs) as AvgDBTotalTimeMs avg(cpuTime) as AvgCPUTimeMs  median(runTime) as medianRunTimeMs avg(memcachedMS) as AvgMemcachedTimeMs perc95(runTime) as P95RuntimeMs perc98(runTime) as P98RunTimeMs by zone | eval avgRunTimeMs= round(avgRunTimeMs),  AvgDBTotalTimeMs=round(AvgDBTotalTimeMs),  AvgCPUTimeMs=round(AvgCPUTimeMs), medianRunTimeMs=round(medianRunTimeMs),  AvgMemcachedTimeMs=round(AvgMemcachedTimeMs),P95RuntimeMs=round(P95RuntimeMs), P98RunTimeMs=round(P98RunTimeMs)  | addinfo | eval Steady_State_Sec = round(info_max_time - info_min_time)   | eval TPS=round(RequestCount/Steady_State_Sec)    | table Steady_State_Sec zone ServerCount RequestCount TPS  avgRunTimeMs  AvgDBTotalTimeMs  AvgCPUTimeMs medianRunTimeMs  AvgMemcachedTimeMs  P95RuntimeMs P98RunTimeMs

SPLUNK.name: Falcon Bulk API V1 Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 
`logRecordType(apblk)` success=1  | dedup timestamp logRecordType requestId 
| eval recordsProcessed=if(success==1,rowsProcessed,0) 
|  eval ioType = case(verb=="query","read",verb=="queryAll","read",verb=="update","write",verb=="insert","write",verb=="upsert","write") 
|  stats dc(jobId) as totalUniqueJobs count(batchId) as totalBatches sum(numFailures) as numFailures sum(recordsProcessed) as recordsProcessed max(recordsProcessed) as recordsProcessedMax sum(cpuTime) as totalCPUTime sum(runTime) as totalRunTime p50(runTime) as p50RunTime by logRecordType  
|  eval totalRecordsProcessed=if(ioType="read" AND totalBatches=1,recordsProcessedMax,recordsProcessed) 
|  eval rowsProcessedPerBatch = ROUND(recordsProcessed/totalBatches,0) 
|  eval avgRunTimePerBatch = ROUND(totalRunTime/totalBatches,2) 
|  eval p50RunTimeMS = ROUND(p50RunTime,2) 
|  eval recordsSuccessful=recordsProcessed-recordsFailed 
|  eval timeToComplete=strftime(end-start,"%H:%M:%S:%3N") 
| eval totalCPUTimeS = round(totalCPUTime/1000,2)
| eval totalRunTimeS = round(totalRunTime/1000,2)
|  fields logRecordType totalUniqueJobs totalBatches  totalRecordsProcessed totalCPUTimeS totalRunTimeS p50RunTimeMS rowsProcessedPerBatch avgRunTimePerBatch 
|  stats sum(totalUniqueJobs) as "Total Unique Jobs" SUM(totalRecordsProcessed) as "Processed Records Count" SUM(totalBatches) as "Processed Batches Count" SUM(rowsProcessedPerBatch) as "Processed Rows Per Batch Count" sum(totalRunTimeS) as "Total RunTime (s)" sum(totalCPUTimeS) as "Total CpuTime (s)" p50(p50RunTimeMS) as "p50 RunTime (ms)" avg(avgRunTimePerBatch) as "Avg RunTime Per Batch (ms)"

SPLUNK.name: Falcon Bulk API V2 Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 organizationId=* `logRecordType(apbv2)` jobStatus=JobComplete | dedup timestamp logRecordType requestId 
| stats dc(jobId) as "Total Unique Jobs" count as "Batches Count" avg(cpuTime) as "AvgCpuTime" avg(runTime) as "AvgRunTime"
| eval AvgCpuTime=round(AvgCpuTime,2)
|eval AvgRunTime=round(AvgRunTime,2)
| rename AvgCpuTime as "Avg CpuTime (ms)" AvgRunTime as "Avg RunTime (ms)"

SPLUNK.name: Falcon CaaS Errors
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 logRecordType=s nameWithCategory="*caas.objectType.*.errorCount"  | stats sum(count) as "Count"

SPLUNK.name: Falcon DB Connection Exceptions
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 
`logRecordType(gglog, gslog)` "ORACLE.*Exception"  | rex field=gackSummary "(?<shortGackSummary>[^\s]+Exception).*" | eval bothHostAndGack=host.":".shortGackSummary | fillnull value=NULL | stats count as "Total DB Exceptions"

SPLUNK.name: Falcon Heap Memory Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(g)` heapPoolName=*G1* OR heapPoolName=*CodeHeap* OR heapPoolName="Heap Totals"  | eval heapUsedMB = heapUsed/(1024*1024) | stats avg(heapUsedMB) as avg_heapUsedMB max(heapUsedMB) as max_heapUsedMB by heapPoolName | eval avg_heapUsedMB = round(avg_heapUsedMB,2) | eval max_heapUsedMB = round(max_heapUsedMB,2) | rename heapPoolName as "Heap Pool Name" avg_heapUsedMB as "Avg Heap Used (MB)" max_heapUsedMB as "Max Heap Used (MB)"

SPLUNK.name: Falcon Lightning EPT Summary
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 organizationId=*
`logRecordType(ailtn)` appExperience=SFX* appName=one:one schemaId=*LightningPageView | dedup timestamp logRecordType requestId  | spath input=payload | where 'previousPage.context'!="undefined"
| eval pageName=case(
'page.context'="force:objectHomeDesktop" AND 'page.context'='previousPage.context' AND 'page.entityType'='previousPage.entityType', "SelectListView",
'page.context'="force:objectHomeDesktop" AND ('page.context'!='previousPage.context' OR 'page.entityType'!='previousPage.entityType'), "ObjectHome",
'page.context'="one:recordHomeFlexipage2Wrapper", "RecordHome",
'page.context'="one:recordActionWrapper" AND 'previousPage.context'="force:objectHomeDesktop", "NewRecord-RecordType",
'page.context'="one:recordActionWrapper" AND 'previousPage.context'="one:recordActionWrapper", "NewRecord-Edit",
'page.context'="one:auraContainer" AND 'page.attributes.url'="/lightning/cmp/runtime_sales_lead__convertDesktopConsole", "LeadConvertContainer",
'page.attributes.url'="/lightning/cmp/runtime_sales_cadencebuilder__cadenceBuilder", "CadenceBuilder",
'page.context'="runtime_sales_cadence:cadenceObjectHome" AND 'previousPage.attributes.url'="/lightning/cmp/runtime_sales_cadencebuilder__cadenceBuilder", "CadenceObjectHome(cached)",
'page.context'="runtime_sales_cadence:cadenceObjectHome" AND 'previousPage.attributes.url'!="/lightning/cmp/runtime_sales_cadencebuilder__cadenceBuilder", "CadenceObjectHome",
1=1, 'page.context') | rename page.attributes.app.appType as appType
| rename page.entityType as entityType
| rename page.attributes.app.appName as appName
| rename page.attributes.app.appNamespace as appNamespace | stats count as TotalLightningPagesCount, avg(ept) as avg_EPT, median(ept) as median_EPT, p75(ept) as p75_EPT, p90(ept) as p90_EPT, p95(ept) as p95_EPT, p99(ept) as p99_EPT dc(userId) as Distinct_Users
| eval avg_EPT = round(avg_EPT,1)
| eval median_EPT = round(median_EPT,1)
| eval p75_EPT = round(p75_EPT,1)
| eval p90_EPT = round(p90_EPT,1)
| eval p95_EPT = round(p95_EPT,1)
| eval p99_EPT = round(p99_EPT,1)
| eval avg_EPT = round(avg_EPT,1)
| rename TotalLightningPagesCount as "Total Lightning Pages Count"
| rename avg_EPT as "Avg EPT"
| rename median_EPT as "Median EPT"
| rename p75_EPT as "p75 EPT"
| rename p90_EPT as "p90 EPT"
| rename p95_EPT as "p95 EPT"
| rename p99_EPT as "p99 EPT"

SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 organizationId=*
`logRecordType(ailtn)` appExperience=SFX* appName=one:one schemaId=*LightningPageView | dedup timestamp logRecordType requestId  | spath input=payload | where 'previousPage.context'!="undefined"
| eval pageName=case(
'page.context'="force:objectHomeDesktop" AND 'page.context'='previousPage.context' AND 'page.entityType'='previousPage.entityType', "SelectListView",
'page.context'="force:objectHomeDesktop" AND ('page.context'!='previousPage.context' OR 'page.entityType'!='previousPage.entityType'), "ObjectHome",
'page.context'="one:recordHomeFlexipage2Wrapper", "RecordHome",
'page.context'="one:recordActionWrapper" AND 'previousPage.context'="force:objectHomeDesktop", "NewRecord-RecordType",
'page.context'="one:recordActionWrapper" AND 'previousPage.context'="one:recordActionWrapper", "NewRecord-Edit",
'page.context'="one:auraContainer" AND 'page.attributes.url'="/lightning/cmp/runtime_sales_lead__convertDesktopConsole", "LeadConvertContainer",
'page.attributes.url'="/lightning/cmp/runtime_sales_cadencebuilder__cadenceBuilder", "CadenceBuilder",
'page.context'="runtime_sales_cadence:cadenceObjectHome" AND 'previousPage.attributes.url'="/lightning/cmp/runtime_sales_cadencebuilder__cadenceBuilder", "CadenceObjectHome(cached)",
'page.context'="runtime_sales_cadence:cadenceObjectHome" AND 'previousPage.attributes.url'!="/lightning/cmp/runtime_sales_cadencebuilder__cadenceBuilder", "CadenceObjectHome",
1=1, 'page.context') | rename page.attributes.app.appType as appType
| rename page.entityType as entityType
| rename page.attributes.app.appName as appName
| rename page.attributes.app.appNamespace as appNamespace
| rename "attributes.eptDeviation" as eptDeviation
| stats count as TotalLightningPagesCount, avg(ept) as avg_EPT, median(ept) as median_EPT, p75(ept) as p75_EPT, p90(ept) as p90_EPT, p95(ept) as p95_EPT, p99(ept) as p99_EPT dc(userId) as Distinct_Users by eptDeviation
| eval avg_EPT = round(avg_EPT,1)
| eval median_EPT = round(median_EPT,1)
| eval p75_EPT = round(p75_EPT,1)
| eval p90_EPT = round(p90_EPT,1)
| eval p95_EPT = round(p95_EPT,1)
| eval p99_EPT = round(p99_EPT,1)
| eval avg_EPT = round(avg_EPT,1)
| rename TotalLightningPagesCount as "Total Lightning Pages Count"
| rename avg_EPT as "Avg EPT"
| rename median_EPT as "Median EPT"
| rename p75_EPT as "p75 EPT"
| rename p90_EPT as "p90 EPT"
| rename p95_EPT as "p95 EPT"
| rename p99_EPT as "p99 EPT"

SPLUNK.name: Falcon Logs Volume Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 sourcetype=applog* | dedup timestamp logRecordType requestId  | eval ailtnSize=len(_raw) | stats count as Count sum(ailtnSize) as "TotalLogSzie" | eval TotalLogSzie = round(TotalLogSzie/1000000,2) | rename TotalLogSzie as "Size (MB)"

SPLUNK.name: Falcon Memory Allocation Summary
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 organizationId=*
`logRecordType(A,a,U,apars,aprst,R)` | dedup timestamp logRecordType requestId  | eval mvField=split(timeTracker, ",") | eval bytesAllocated=mvindex(mvField,23) | eval bytesAllocatedGB = bytesAllocated/(1024*1024*1024) | eval bytesAllocatedMB = bytesAllocated/(1024*1024) | stats count as Total_Requests sum(bytesAllocatedGB) as TotalAllocatedMemoryInGB avg(bytesAllocatedMB) as AverageAllocatedMemoryInMB
| eval TotalAllocatedMemoryInGB = round(TotalAllocatedMemoryInGB)
| eval AverageAllocatedMemoryInMB = round(AverageAllocatedMemoryInMB,2)

SPLUNK.name: Falcon Nebula Errors
SPLUNK.executed_query: search `from_index_distapps` falcon_instance::perf1-useast2 starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 functional_domain::core1 service_name::* k8s_cluster::sam-processing1 k8s_namespace::performance k8s_pod_name::ff0df22a-ad52-47e4-8332-419fc5740310* sourcetype="soleil:clientError:csv" _raw = "*Error in Action*" | eval fields=split(_raw,",") | eval errorMessage=mvindex(fields,5) | eval script=mvindex(fields,2) | eval errorType=substr(errorMessage,1,150) | stats count as NebulaErrors by script | sort by -NebulaErrors

SPLUNK.name: Falcon Overall Summary Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 organizationId=* `logRecordType(A,a,U,apars,aprst,R,apblk)` | dedup timestamp logRecordType requestId 
| rex field=oracleStats "m(?<sdb_dbcpu>\d+)y" | rex field=oracleStats "h(?<sdb_dbtime>\d+)d"
| eval cpuTimeS = round(cpuTime/1000,2)
| eval oraDBTimeS = round(oraDbTime/1000,2)
| eval sdbDBTimeS = sdb_dbtime/1000000000
| eval sdbCpuTimeS = sdb_dbcpu/1000000000
| eval totalRunTimeS = round(runTime/1000,2)
| eval dbTotalTimeS = round(dbTotalTime/1000000000,2)
| eval GCTimeS = round(totalGcTimeMs/1000,2)
| eval memcachedS = round(memcached/1000000000,2)
| stats count as TPS sum(totalRunTimeS) as "Total RunTime (s)" sum(cpuTimeS) as "Total CpuTime (s)" sum(dbTotalTimeS) as "Total DBTime (s)" sum(sdbDBTimeS) as "Total SDB DBTime (s)" sum(sdbCpuTimeS) as "Total SDB CPUTime (s)" sum(GCTimeS) as "Total GC Time (s)" sum(memcachedS) as "Total MemCachedTime (s)" sum(memcachedGets) as "Total MemCached Gets Count" sum(memcachedOperations) as "Total MemCached Operations Count" sum(memcachedRoundTrips) as "Total MemCached RoundTrips Count" | eval TPS = round(TPS/3600,0) | rename TPS as "TPS Count"

SPLUNK.name: Falcon Release Info
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(gglog,G)` 
| head 1 
| rex field=_raw "Branch:\s+(?<branch>[^\n]+)"
| rex field=_raw "Changelist:\s+(?<changelist>\d+)"
| rex field=_raw "CreationDate:\s+(?<creation_date>[\w\s:]+GMT \d+)"
| table branch, changelist, creation_date

SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 
`logRecordType(dbdbg)` logName="sfdc.common.util.database.ConnectionPool2"   | rex field=message ".*Num waiting=(?<numWaiting>.*),.*" | fillnull value=0  | stats sum(numWaiting) as count | appendpipe [stats count | where count=0]

SPLUNK.name: Falcon Solr Search Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 organizationId=* `logRecordType(Q)`  | eval searchTimeInSec = searchRunTime/1000 | stats count as Count sum(searchTimeInSec) as TotalSearchTimeS avg(searchRunTime) as avgSearchTimeMS by isFallback | eval TotalSearchTimeS=round(TotalSearchTimeS,2),avgSearchTimeMS=round(avgSearchTimeMS,2) | eval isFallback=if(isFallback>0,"Failed Requests","Successful Requests") | rename isFallback as "FallBack Search" TotalSearchTimeS as "Total SearchTime (s)" avgSearchTimeMS as "Avg SearchTime (ms)"

SPLUNK.name: Falcon - Total DML Operations
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 organizationId=* `logRecordType(colog)` DBSavePerf | bucket _time span=1m| rex field=message ".numRows\=(?<numRows>[0-9]).elapsedTimeMs\=(?<elapsedTimeMs>[0-9\.]).numIndexes\=(?<numIndexes>[0-9])..numSkinnyTables\=(?<numSkinnyTables>[0-9])." | stats count as "Total Operations" avg(elapsedTimeMs) as AvgTimeMs sum(numRows) as "Total Rows Affected" by subCategory2 | eval AvgTimeMs=round(AvgTimeMs,1) | rename AvgTimeMs as "Avg Time Taken (ms)"

SPLUNK.name: Falcon Total Gacks
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(gslog)` "*" | dedup timestamp logRecordType requestId  | eval shortGackSummary = substr(gackSummary, 0, 50) | stats count as TotalGacks | stats sum(TotalGacks) as "Count"

search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(ailtn)` appExperience=SFX* appName=one:one schemaId=*LightningPageView | spath input=payload path=ept output=ept
    | spath input=payload path=attributes.eptDeviation output=eptDeviation
    | search eptDeviation=false

SPLUNK.name: Lightning Pages EPT
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(ailtn)` appExperience=SFX* appName=one:one schemaId=*LightningPageView | spath input=payload | rename previousPage.context as previousPageContext  | where previousPageContext!="undefined" | eval ept =round(ept,2) | stats count as "Request Count", median(ept) as "Median EPT (ms)", p75(ept) as "p75 EPT (ms)", perc90(ept) as "p90 EPT (ms)", p95(ept) as "p95 EPT (ms)"  by page.attributes.app.appType, page.context, page.entityType | rename page.attributes.app.appType as "App Type" page.entityType as "Entity Type" page.context as "Context"

`logRecordType(madep)` (asyncId=*) | eval DeployTimeInSec = totalTime/1000 | eval totalMemoryAllocatedinMB = deployMemoryAllocated/1024  | stats count as TotalExecutions avg(DeployTimeInSec) as DeployTimeInSec avg(totalMemoryAllocatedinMB) as AvgTotalMemoryAllocatedinMB by organizationId

SPLUNK.name: Metrics by AZ
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(A,J,L,R,U,V,a,aprst,apars)` OR `logRecordType(rrlog,vfrmt,2,H)` | stats count, avg(runTime) as avg_runTime, avg(cpuTime) as avg_cpuTime, avg(memcached) as avg_memcachedTime, avg(dbTotalTime) as avg_dbTotalTime by zone | eval avg_dbTotalTime=avg_dbTotalTime/1000000, avg_memcachedTime=avg_memcachedTime/1000000 | eval avg_runTime = round(avg_runTime,0), avg_cpuTime = round(avg_cpuTime,0), avg_memcachedTime = round(avg_memcachedTime,0), avg_dbTotalTime = round(avg_dbTotalTime,0) | rename zone as AZ, count as "Request Count", avg_runTime as "Avg RunTime (ms)", avg_cpuTime as "Avg CpuTime (ms)", avg_memcachedTime as "Avg MemcachedTime (ms)", avg_dbTotalTime as "Avg DBTotalTime (ms)"

SPLUNK.name: Nebula Errors - Client Side Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query: search `from_index_distapps` falcon_instance::perf1-useast2 starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 functional_domain::core1 service_name::* k8s_cluster::sam-processing1 k8s_namespace::performance k8s_pod_name::ff0df22a-ad52-47e4-8332-419fc5740310* sourcetype="soleil:clientError:csv" _raw = "*Error in Action*"| eval fields=split(_raw,",") | eval errorMessage=mvindex(fields,5) | eval script=mvindex(fields,2) | eval errorType=substr(errorMessage,1,150) | stats count as "Count" by script | rename script as "Script"

SPLUNK.name: Old Gen HeapMemory - Falcon

fields.name: Old Gen Heap Memory Post GC (GB)

SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(g)` heapPoolName="G1 Old Gen"
| eval heapUsedGB = heapUsed/(1024*1024*1024)
| stats count min(heapUsedGB) as HeapUsedGB_AfterMajorGC avg(heapUsedGB) sum(heapUsedGB) by host
| where HeapUsedGB_AfterMajorGC > 7
| stats min(HeapUsedGB_AfterMajorGC) as HeapUsedGB_AfterMajorGC
| eval HeapUsedGB_AfterMajorGC = round(HeapUsedGB_AfterMajorGC,2)
| rename HeapUsedGB_AfterMajorGC as "Old Gen Heap Memory Post GC (GB)"

SPLUNK.name: Record home of Standard Objects
SPLUNK.executed_query:
search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(ailtn)`
appExperience=SFX* appName=one:one schemaId=*LightningPageView 
| spath input=payload path=attributes.eptDeviation output=eptDeviation | search eptDeviation=false
| spath input=payload path=page.context output=pageContext | search pageContext="*recordHome*"
| spath input=payload path=page.entityType output=entityType  
| eval appType = spath(payload, "page.attributes.app.appType")
| spath input=payload path=ept output=ept
| spath input=payload path=attributes.totalEpt output=totalEpt
| spath input=payload path=attributes.browserIdleTime output=browserIdleTime
| spath input=payload path=sequence output=sequence 
| spath input=payload path=attributes.cacheState output=cacheState 
| eval ept = round(ept, 2) 
| stats count as "Request Count", p75(ept) as "p75 EPT (ms)" by entityType

SPLUNK.name: Summary Core Cost Logline Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(A,J,L,R,U,V,a,aprst,apars)` OR `logRecordType(rrlog,vfrmt,2,H)` | eval cpuTimeMs = round(cpuTime,2) | eval dbTotalTimeMs = round(dbTotalTime / 1000000, 2) | eval runTimeMs = round(runTime,2) | eval mvField=split(timeTracker, ",") | eval bytesAllocated=mvindex(mvField,23) | eval bytesAllocatedMB = bytesAllocated/(1024*1024) | stats count as "Request Count" avg(cpuTime) as "avg_CpuTime" perc50(cpuTimeMs) as "p50 CpuTime (ms)" perc90(cpuTimeMs) as "p90 CpuTime (ms)" avg(runTime) as "avg_RunTime" perc50(runTimeMs) as "p50 RunTime (ms)" perc90(runTimeMs) as "p90 RunTime (ms)" avg(dbTotalTimeMs) as "avg_DBTotalTime" perc50(dbTotalTimeMs) as "p50 DBTotalTime (ms)" p90(dbTotalTimeMs) as "p90 DBTotalTime (ms)" avg(bytesAllocatedMB) as avg_AllocatedMemoryInMB | eval avg_CpuTime = round(avg_CpuTime,2) | eval avg_RunTime = round(avg_RunTime,2) | eval avg_DBTotalTime = round(avg_DBTotalTime,2) | eval avg_AllocatedMemoryInMB = round(avg_AllocatedMemoryInMB,2) | rename avg_CpuTime as "Avg CpuTime (ms)" avg_RunTime as "Avg RunTime (ms)" avg_DBTotalTime as "Avg DBTotalTime (ms)" avg_AllocatedMemoryInMB as "Avg Allocated Memory (MB)"

SPLUNK.name: Summary Core Cost Logline TPS
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(A,J,L,R,U,V,a,aprst,apars)` OR `logRecordType(rrlog,vfrmt,2,H)` | bucket span=60s _time | stats count as TPS by _time | eval TPS = TPS / 60 | eval Metric = "TPS" | stats avg(TPS) as Value by Metric | eval Value = round(Value)

SPLUNK.name: Summary Garbage Collection Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) substrate=aws falcon_instance=perf1-useast2 functional_domain=core1 sourcetype=casam_jvm cell=gra201 starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 sourcetype=casam_jvm "[gc " ("Young" OR "Full") | rex field=_raw ".*GC\(\d+\)\s+Pause\s+(?<gc_type>.*)\s+\d+.*[BKMG]\)\s+(?<pause>\d+.\d+)ms" | eval feature = case((like(gc_type,"%Young%")), "MINOR_GC", (like(gc_type,"%Full%")), "MAJOR_GC", 1==1, gc_type)| stats count as "Count", avg(pause) as avgPauseTime, max(pause) as maxPauseTime by feature | eval avgPauseTime = round(avgPauseTime,2) | eval maxPauseTime = round(maxPauseTime,2) | rename feature as "GC Type" avgPauseTime as "Avg Time Taken (ms)" maxPauseTime as "Max Time Taken (ms)"

SPLUNK.name: Summary Heap Memory Metrics
SPLUNK.executed_query: search (index=coretest) (pod::gra201) (dc::perf1-useast2) starttime=02/13/2025:09:36:00 endtime=02/13/2025:10:36:00 `logRecordType(g)` heapPoolName=*G1* OR heapPoolName=*CodeHeap* OR heapPoolName="Heap Totals" | eval heapUsedMB = heapUsed/1000000 | stats avg(heapUsedMB) as avg_heapUsedMB max(heapUsedMB) as max_heapUsedMB by heapPoolName | eval avg_heapUsedMB = round(avg_heapUsedMB,2) | eval max_heapUsedMB = round(max_heapUsedMB,2) | rename heapPoolName as "Heap Pool Name" avg_heapUsedMB as "Avg Heap Used (MB)" max_heapUsedMB as "Max Heap Used (MB)"
